data.oai_dc:dc: R script using the bootstrap to estimate three measures of genetic diversity (allelic diversity, Shannon diversity, and expected heterozygosity). Requires IAL_popsim.R and an input file of microsatellite genotypes (IAL_RWBL_genotypes.csv). Written by J. Johndrow.
red-winged blackbird|indirect benefits|population structure|genetic variation|polyandry|mating systems
